\[\begin{array}{l}å¥‡å˜å¶ä¸å˜,ç¬¦å·çœ‹ç›¸é™,é»˜è®¤0< \alpha <\frac{\pi}{2} \\\sin(\frac{\pi}{2}+\alpha) = \cos \alpha, \quad\sin(\frac{\pi}{2}-\alpha) = \cos \alpha \\\cos(\frac{\pi}{2}+\alpha) = -\sin \alpha, \quad\cos(\frac{\pi}{2}-\alpha) = \sin \alpha \\\sin(\pi+\alpha) = -\sin \alpha, \quad \sin(\pi-\alpha) = \sin \alpha\\\cos(\pi+\alpha) = -\cos \alpha, \quad \cos(\pi-\alpha) = -\cos \alpha\\---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------\\\sin(\alpha \pm \beta) = \sin\alpha\cos\beta \pm \sin\beta \cos\alpha\\\cos(\alpha \pm \beta) = \cos\alpha\cos\beta \mp\sin\alpha\sin\beta\\\tan(\alpha\pm\beta) =\frac{\tan\alpha\pm\tan\beta}{1\mp\tan\alpha\tan\beta}\\\cot(\alpha\pm\beta) = \frac{\cot\alpha\cot\beta\mp +1}{\cot\beta\pm\cot\alpha}\\\sin2\alpha = 2\sin\alpha\cos\alpha \\\cos2\alpha =\cos^2\alpha-\sin^2\alpha=1-2\sin^2\alpha=2\cos^2\alpha-1\\\sin^3\alpha=-4sin^3\alpha+3\sin\alpha,\cos^3\alpha=4\cos^3\alpha-3\cos\alpha\\\tan2\alpha=\frac{2\tan\alpha}{1-\tan^2\alpha},\cot2^\alpha=\frac{\cot^2\alpha- 1}{2\cot\alpha}\\\end{array}\]

\[\begin{array}{l}y=\sin x \quad y' = \cos x;\quad y=\cos x \quad y'= -\sin x;\\y=\tan x \quad y' =\sec^2x;\quad y = \cot x \quad y'=-\csc^2x;\\y= \sec x \quad y'=\sec x \tan x;\quad y = \csc x\quad y'=-\cscx\cot x;\\y = \arcsin x \quad y' = \frac{1}{\sqrt{1-x^2}}; \quad y =\arccos x \quad y' = -\frac{1}{\sqrt{1-x^2}};\\y = \arctan x \quad y' = \frac{1}{1+x^2};\quad y = arccot \ x =-\frac{1}{1+x^2};\\(x^a)'= ax^{a-1},\quad (a^x)'=a^x\ln a,\quad (\log _ax)'=\frac{1}{x\ln a}\\(\ln |x|)' = \frac{1}{x}\\[\ln (x + \sqrt{x^2 + 1})]' = \frac{1}{\sqrt{x^2 + 1}},\quad [\ln (x+ \sqrt{x^2 - 1})]' = \frac{1}{\sqrt{x^2 - 1}}\\---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------\\\end{array}\]

entry.title: DESCRIBE A PLACE YOU ENJOY
entry.content:
Write a paragraph describing your favorite place to visit. It couldbe a city, a park, a beach, or any other location that you love.Describe what you like about it and why you enjoy going there.

One of my favorite places to visit is a quiet and peaceful beachlocated near my hometown. Whenever I go there, I feel a sense ofrelaxation that helps me escape from the stresses of everyday life. Thenatural scenery is absolutely breathtaking, with crystal-clear watersand soft white sand. The sound of waves crashing against the shore andthe gentle breeze blowing through my hair create a calming atmospherethat makes me feel at ease. I also love the fact that the beach is notovercrowded, which allows me to enjoy the tranquility and serenity ofthe place. Overall, it's the perfect destination for me to unwind andrecharge my batteries.

NOTES

  • tranquility: Tranquility means a state of calmness and peacefulness,free from disturbance or turmoil. It's often used to describe a place orsituation that is serene and quiet, and where one can relax and unwind.For example, someone might describe a peaceful beach or a quiet forestas having a sense of tranquility.
  • breathtaking: Breathtaking means that something is so impressive orbeautiful that it literally takes your breath away or makes you feel asthough you are unable to breathe for a moment. It's often used todescribe natural landscapes or scenery that are incredibly stunning andawe-inspiring. For example, a breathtaking view from a mountaintop or abreathtaking sunset over the ocean.
  • as though: "As though" is a conjunction that is used to make acomparison between two things or situations that may not actually betrue. It is similar in meaning to "as if". For example, "She acted asthough she didn't know me" means that she behaved in a way thatsuggested she didn't know me, even though she might have actually knownme. It's often used to express hypothetical or imaginarysituations.

Tip

The above essay have been modified from CHATGPT which is very helpfulfor my English.

At the end, I want to say thank you for its help. And let it modifywhat I'm saying.

My Exact Words: Thank you so much. I have learnedlots of knowledge from you at this time. If possible, could you help memake my words up there more coherent and smooth.

Its Modification: Thank you so much for all yourhelp. I've learned a lot from you during our conversation today.

This is a slight rephrasing that uses a more conversational tone andincludes a reference to our conversation, which makes the sentence morespecific and personal.

ğŸ˜€ğŸ˜€ğŸ˜€ It's a wonderful modification!!!!!!
